乜都唔識 + HD： 14k - 15k
識少少 + HD： 16k-18k
u gard + 白紙： 16k~18k
u grad + 有intern/相關pt/freelance exp : 19k ~21k

* 白紙解有接受過IT-related degree 教學，有oop concept ，data structure， 並基本認識2, 3 種language (用過下)


早前我去一間係尖沙咀,叫"Cyber Universal Company Limited. 新意環球有限公司"見programmer
問起我點解想離開上一間公司
我同佢講因為上一間公司成日開OT,令我好難半工讀到
佢竟然好串咁話:我地間公司成日都做到8,9點架啦!!好多時星期六、日都要OT返工!!
你想準時放工去讀書?
去做保安啦你!!
保安咪準時放工收工後乜都唔洗理囉!!
你走得架啦!!
轉行做保安啦!!
果刻火到拍枱起身走

你地日日開OT=好威同正常?
係你地管理同能力問題吓?垃圾港資扮大牌!!

其實點分vendor si同inhouse


Vendor 同si 都係靠it 維生既公司
接人地project 去搵錢
Si 會比vendor 做多少少 例如做埋硬件野 由頭包到落尾
成個project 可能係si 公司接 入面有唔同vendor 做唔同野 si 就將佢地合番埋咁 我理解會咁
Inhouse 公司多數都唔係it 公司 唔係靠it 人維生
就好似你入retail 公司做it 你就係inhouse 咁啦
有錯勿屌

Vendor多數係指service/product provider，唔一定全包，可能只provide舊鐵。而si多數係做total solution，搵vendor distributor攞貨做value added service比個客，多數project based。inhouse好易理解，你個客係自己公司，dev/ ops/ support都會有。

砌機做例子，你同C公司砌部i7 RX580機。intel係cpu vendor，amd係display card vendor，C公司係si，C公司inhouse就負責main住website, server, POS。

IT Support Junior at Japanese Company(Fresh Graduate is OK)

Job Title: IT Support Junior at Japanese Company(Fresh Graduate is OK)
Contract Type: Permanent
Location: Hong Kong
Industry:
IT & Telecoms
Salary: Negotiable
Reference: AR-170630-01
Contact Name: Kazuma Araki
Contact Email: kazuma.araki@jac-recruitment.com
Job Published: June 30, 2017 17:59
Job Description

Responsibilities



• Support the company’s IT infrastructures (PC, server, network, etc), AV equipment, POS, and CCTV of Hong Kong office. For example, on-site software & hardware installation, repair, etc.
• Perform IT helpdesk support including call handling, follow-up action and coordination.
• Monitor the system and networks status.
• Manage infrastructural changes.
• Maintain and optimize the system
• Perform routine and on-demand data extraction from website
• Maintain and optimize various websites that are related to the business operation.
• Carry out basic user training.
• Develop new applications to improve the operation of office.
• Communicate and work with internal staff (local and overseas) and external partners to resolve incidents and issues.



Requirements

• Good knowledge in SQL and Database.
• Good knowledge in Web Application Development (HTML, PHP)
• Experienced in IT support, including dealt with networking and operation system.
• Software developing experience (any kind of language) is preferred.
• Basic knowledge in Java will be an advantage (not necessary).
• Self-motivated, customer oriented, and able to work as part of a team.
• Immediately available or short period of notice is preferred.



Interested candidates, kindly send your detailed resume in MS Word including:
1) Expected salary
2) Current and last drawn salaries
3) Reason for leaving current and past employments

directly to kazuma. araki @jac-recruitment.com and CC jac.hk @jac-recruitment.com

Analyst Programmer will have the opportunity to develop technical skills and expand their industry knowledge through hands on experience and are included in the regular daily activities within their respective functional team i.e. operation meetings, customer meetings (as appropriate), and technical discussions that would pertain to their area of expertise.

· Ability to work in a challenging, fast-paced team-oriented environment
